entity.query: update ST_ALTERNATE_HIST_ALLOCATION SET ACTUAL_UNITS =0 ,PROJECTION_UNITS =0, ACTUAL_ALLOCATION_PERCENT=0,PROJECTION_ALLOCATION_PERCENT=0 WHERE USER_ID=[$USER_ID] AND SESSION_ID=[$SESSION_ID] AND CHECK_RECORD=1

update dbo.ST_DISC_ALTERNATE_HIST_ALLOCATION SET ACTUAL_AMOUNT =0 ,PROJECTION_AMOUNT =0, ACTUAL_ALLOCATION_PERCENT=0,PROJECTION_ALLOCATION_PERCENT=0 WHERE USER_ID=[$USER_ID] AND SESSION_ID=[$SESSION_ID] AND CHECK_RECORD=1

SELECT DISTINCT CM.COMPANY_NAME AS CONTRACT_HOLDER, CON_M.CONTRACT_NO, CON_M.CONTRACT_NAME, HT.DESCRIPTION AS MARKET_TYPE, CM1.COMPANY_NO, CM1.COMPANY_NAME, CON_M.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID, CM1.COMPANY_MASTER_SID,CS.AVAILABLE_CHECKBOX FROM DBO.CONTRACT_MASTER CON_M LEFT JOIN DBO.COMPANY_MASTER CM ON CON_M.CONT_HOLD_COMPANY_MASTER_SID = CM.COMPANY_MASTER_SID INNER JOIN DBO.HELPER_TABLE HT ON CON_M.CONTRACT_TYPE = HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID INNER JOIN DBO.CFP_CONTRACT CFP_CON ON CON_M.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID = CFP_CON.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID INNER JOIN DBO.CFP_CONTRACT_DETAILS CFP_CD ON CFP_CON.CFP_CONTRACT_SID = CFP_CD.CFP_CONTRACT_SID JOIN DBO.COMPANY_MASTER CM1 ON CM1.COMPANY_MASTER_SID = CFP_CD.COMPANY_MASTER_SID LEFT JOIN ST_AL_HISTORY_CUSTOMER_SELECTION CS ON CM1.COMPANY_MASTER_SID = CS.COMPANY_MASTER_SID AND CS.USER_ID = [$USER_ID] AND CS.SESSION_ID=[$SESSION_ID] AND CON_M.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID = CS.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID

SELECT DISTINCT CM.COMPANY_NAME AS CONTRACT_HOLDER, CON_M.CONTRACT_NO, CON_M.CONTRACT_NAME, HT.DESCRIPTION AS MARKET_TYPE, CM1.COMPANY_NO, CM1.COMPANY_NAME, CON_M.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID, CM1.COMPANY_MASTER_SID FROM DBO.CONTRACT_MASTER CON_M LEFT JOIN DBO.COMPANY_MASTER CM ON CON_M.CONT_HOLD_COMPANY_MASTER_SID = CM.COMPANY_MASTER_SID INNER JOIN DBO.HELPER_TABLE HT ON CON_M.CONTRACT_TYPE = HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID INNER JOIN DBO.CFP_CONTRACT CFP_CON ON CON_M.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID = CFP_CON.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID INNER JOIN DBO.CFP_CONTRACT_DETAILS CFP_CD ON CFP_CON.CFP_CONTRACT_SID = CFP_CD.CFP_CONTRACT_SID JOIN DBO.COMPANY_MASTER CM1 ON CM1.COMPANY_MASTER_SID = CFP_CD.COMPANY_MASTER_SID

MERGE ST_AL_HISTORY_CUSTOMER_SELECTION AS T USING ([$SOURCE_TABLE]) AS S ON T.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID = S.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID AND T.COMPANY_MASTER_SID = S.COMPANY_MASTER_SID AND T.USER_ID = [$USER_ID] AND T.SESSION_ID = [$SESSION_ID] WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (CONTRACT_MASTER_SID, COMPANY_MASTER_SID, AVAILABLE_CHECKBOX, SELECTED_RECORDS, USER_ID, SESSION_ID, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE) VALUES (S.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID, S.COMPANY_MASTER_SID, [$AVAILABLE_CHECKBOX], [$SELECTED_RECORDS], [$USER_ID], [$SESSION_ID], Getdate()) WHEN matched THEN UPDATE SET T.AVAILABLE_CHECKBOX =[$AVAILABLE_CHECKBOX] , T.LAST_MODIFIED_DATE=GETDATE() ;
UPDATE ST_AL_HISTORY_CUSTOMER_SELECTION SET SELECTED_RECORDS = 0, SELECTED_CHECKBOX = 0 WHERE USER_ID = [$USER_ID] AND SESSION_ID = [$SESSION_ID]
UPDATE ST_AL_HISTORY_CUSTOMER_SELECTION SET SELECTED_RECORDS = 0, SELECTED_CHECKBOX = 0 WHERE USER_ID = [$USER_ID] AND SESSION_ID = [$SESSION_ID] AND SELECTED_CHECKBOX = 1
UPDATE ST_AL_HISTORY_CUSTOMER_SELECTION SET SELECTED_CHECKBOX = [$SELECTED_CHECKBOX] WHERE USER_ID = [$USER_ID] AND SESSION_ID = [$SESSION_ID] AND SELECTED_RECORDS = 1

UPDATE ST_AL_HISTORY_CUSTOMER_SELECTION SET AVAILABLE_CHECKBOX = [$AVAILABLE_CHECKBOX] WHERE USER_ID = [$USER_ID] AND SESSION_ID = [$SESSION_ID] AND CONTRACT_MASTER_SID = [$CONTRACT_MASTER_SID] AND COMPANY_MASTER_SID = [$COMPANY_MASTER_SID];

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ST_AL_HISTORY_CUSTOMER_SELECTION WHERE CONTRACT_MASTER_SID =[$CONTRACT_MASTER_SID] AND COMPANY_MASTER_SID=[$COMPANY_MASTER_SID] AND USER_ID=[$USER_ID] AND SESSION_ID=[$SESSION_ID]) BEGIN INSERT INTO ST_AL_HISTORY_CUSTOMER_SELECTION ( CONTRACT_MASTER_SID, COMPANY_MASTER_SID, AVAILABLE_CHECKBOX, USER_ID, SESSION_ID, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE) VALUES ([$CONTRACT_MASTER_SID],[$COMPANY_MASTER_SID],[$AVAILABLE_CHECKBOX],[$USER_ID],[$SESSION_ID],GETDATE()) END ELSE BEGIN
UPDATE ST_AL_HISTORY_CUSTOMER_SELECTION SET AVAILABLE_CHECKBOX = [$AVAILABLE_CHECKBOX] , LAST_MODIFIED_DATE=GETDATE() WHERE USER_ID = [$USER_ID] AND SESSION_ID = [$SESSION_ID] AND CONTRACT_MASTER_SID=[$CONTRACT_MASTER_SID] AND COMPANY_MASTER_SID=[$COMPANY_MASTER_SID]
END

UPDATE DBO.ST_AL_HISTORY_CUSTOMER_SELECTION SET SELECTED_RECORDS = [$SELECTED_RECORDS], AVAILABLE_CHECKBOX = 0, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE = Getdate() WHERE USER_ID = [$USER_ID] AND SESSION_ID = [$SESSION_ID] AND AVAILABLE_CHECKBOX = 1

UPDATE DBO.ST_AL_HISTORY_CUSTOMER_SELECTION SET SELECTED_CHECKBOX = [$SELECTED_CHECKBOX] , LAST_MODIFIED_DATE=GETDATE() WHERE USER_ID = [$USER_ID] AND SESSION_ID = [$SESSION_ID] AND CONTRACT_MASTER_SID=[$CONTRACT_MASTER_SID] AND COMPANY_MASTER_SID=[$COMPANY_MASTER_SID]
IF EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ST_AL_HISTORY_CUSTOMER_SELECTION WHERE USER_ID = [$USER_ID] AND SESSION_ID = [$SESSION_ID] AND AVAILABLE_CHECKBOX = [$AVAILABLE_CHECKBOX] ) SELECT 1 ELSE SELECT 0

SELECT CM.COMPANY_NAME AS CONTRACT_HOLDER, CON_M.CONTRACT_NO, CON_M.CONTRACT_NAME, HT.DESCRIPTION AS MARKET_TYPE, CM1.COMPANY_NO, CM1.COMPANY_NAME, CS.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID, CS.COMPANY_MASTER_SID, CS.SELECTED_CHECKBOX FROM ST_AL_HISTORY_CUSTOMER_SELECTION CS JOIN CONTRACT_MASTER CON_M ON CON_M.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID = CS.CONTRACT_MASTER_SID LEFT JOIN DBO.COMPANY_MASTER CM ON CON_M.CONT_HOLD_COMPANY_MASTER_SID = CM.COMPANY_MASTER_SID INNER JOIN DBO.HELPER_TABLE HT ON CON_M.CONTRACT_TYPE = HT.HELPER_TABLE_SID JOIN DBO.COMPANY_MASTER CM1 ON CM1.COMPANY_MASTER_SID = CS.COMPANY_MASTER_SID WHERE SELECTED_RECORDS = 1 AND USER_ID = [$USER_ID] AND SESSION_ID = [$SESSION_ID]
DELETE ST_AL_HISTORY_CUSTOMER_SELECTION WHERE USER_ID = [$USER_ID] AND SESSION_ID = [$SESSION_ID] AND SELECTED_RECORDS = 0

UPDATE ST_ALTERNATE_HIST_ALLOCATION SET ACTUAL_UNITS = 0, PROJECTION_UNITS = 0, ACTUAL_ALLOCATION_PERCENT = 0, PROJECTION_ALLOCATION_PERCENT = 0 WHERE USER_ID = [$USER_ID] AND SESSION_ID = [$SESSION_ID];

UPDATE ST_DISC_ALTERNATE_HIST_ALLOCATION SET ACTUAL_AMOUNT = 0, PROJECTION_AMOUNT = 0, ACTUAL_ALLOCATION_PERCENT = 0, PROJECTION_ALLOCATION_PERCENT = 0 WHERE USER_ID = [$USER_ID] AND SESSION_ID = [$SESSION_ID];

UPDATE ST SET ST.[$ALLOCATION_PERCENT_COLUMN] = [$ALLOCATION_PERCENT], ST.[$UPDATE_COLUMN] = ST.[$TOTAL_COLUMN] * ([$ALLOCATION_PERCENT] / 100), ST.FLAG = '1' FROM [$TABLE_NAME] ST JOIN PERIOD PER ON PER.PERIOD_SID = ST.PERIOD_SID WHERE ST.PROJECTION_DETAILS_SID = [$PROJECTION_DETAILS_SID] AND ST.SESSION_ID = [$SESSION_ID] AND PER."YEAR" = [$YEAR] AND PER.[$FREQUENCY_COLUMN] = [$FREQUENCY];

DECLARE @NEW_VALUE NUMERIC(22,6) = [$NEW_VALUE], @OLD_VALUE NUMERIC(22,6) = (SELECT SUM(ST.[$TOTAL_COLUMN]) FROM [$TABLE_NAME] ST JOIN PERIOD PER ON PER.PERIOD_SID = ST.PERIOD_SID WHERE PROJECTION_DETAILS_SID = [$PROJECTION_DETAILS_SID] AND SESSION_ID = [$SESSION_ID] AND PER."YEAR" = [$YEAR] AND PER.[$FREQUENCY_COLUMN] = [$FREQUENCY]);
UPDATE ST SET [$UPDATE_COLUMN] = ((@NEW_VALUE - @OLD_VALUE)/ NULLIF(@OLD_VALUE,0)) * ST.[$TOTAL_COLUMN] + ST.[$TOTAL_COLUMN], [$ALLOCATION_PERCENT_COLUMN] = (@NEW_VALUE / NULLIF(@OLD_VALUE,0)) * 100, FLAG = '0' FROM [$TABLE_NAME] ST JOIN PERIOD PER ON PER.PERIOD_SID = ST.PERIOD_SID WHERE PROJECTION_DETAILS_SID = [$PROJECTION_DETAILS_SID] AND SESSION_ID = [$SESSION_ID] AND PER."YEAR" = [$YEAR] AND PER.[$FREQUENCY_COLUMN] = [$FREQUENCY];
